CustomField.description: Direct contracts, please select "Livongo". Indicates the Contract Path for the Opportunity, and required for Opps to be closed won. Once an Opp is won, the Contract Path will be represented as a relationship associated to the Client Overview.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Direct contracts, please select "Livongo". Indicates the Contract Path for the Opportunity, and required for Opps to be closed won. Once an Opp is won, the Contract Path will be represented as a relationship associated to the Client Overview.
CustomField.label: Contract Path

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Contract Path must be a Partner Account.
lookupFilter.infoMessage: Contract Path must be a Partner Account.
